text: @NYDailyNews @KipLyn CORONA UPDATE The issue @realDonaldTrump was raising is if @Lysol can kill #Coronavirus #COVID19 on surfaces then, how do we use that chemical OR process to kill it in humans not suggesting ingestion Commonsense  should force all of us to ask the same question
